english.segment1: It's a rodeo, welcome to the big show, round n round n here we go, Can't take it anymore
english.segment2: Hey, let's get it started, show me how ya really want it(come on) , I'll give ya what ya need, because you're a part of me
english.segment3: And You constantly move, even though You disapprove, It's just what You do, it's the way You touch me
english.segment4: I'm alive, because You touched me, take away the things that crush me, No one else can save me like You do, You're in human, I'm alive because You gave me, time enough to shake this hate and, Take it all away, just like You do, you're in human
english.segment5: Hey, let's get it started, show me how ya really want it(come on), Let's turn it up, rip it down and burn it up. Hey, let's get it started, show me how ya really want it(come on) , You're a part of me, I wanna give ya what you need
english.segment6: And You constantly move, even though You disapprove, It's just what you do, it's the way You touch me,
english.segment7: I'm alive, because You touched me, take away the things that crush me, No one else can save me like You do, You're in human, I'm alive because You gave me, time enough to shake this hate and, Take it all away, just like You do, you're in human
english.segment8: Every day, every hour, all the pain, and the power, Every day, every hour, all the pain, and the power (repeated)
english.segment9: Every day, every hour.of the day
english.segment10: I'm alive, because You touched me, take away the things that crush me, No one else can save me like You do, You're in human, I'm alive because You gave me, time enough to shake this hate and, Take it all away, just like You do, you're in human (X2).
